templates.name: What is the difference between a Puff and a Bar?
templates.content:
Both BUILT Bars and BUILT Puffs are designed to provide delicious, protein-rich snacking options. However, they differ mainly in texture and form:

BUILT Bars have a nougaty texture that makes them chewier and generally leaves you feeling fuller and more satisfied. BUILT Bars are known for their rich flavors and are coated in chocolate, providing a satisfying snack that's both nutritious and indulgent, packed with protein to support muscle recovery and satiety.

A BUILT Puff, on the other hand, has a lighter, airier texture, reminiscent of a marshmallow. Made with a proprietary blend of whey and collagen proteins, It's designed to offer a different eating experience, catering to those who prefer a softer, less dense texture. Like the BUILT Bars, BUILT Puffs are also high in protein and coated in chocolate, providing a guilt-free treat that satisfies sweet cravings without compromising nutritional goals.

templates.name: What is the Intelligent Release Technology?
templates.content: Three layers of the most proven natural ingredients combine to create our Intelligent Release TechnologyÂ®. In the first layer, the capsule dissolves, and the quick-release ingredients enter the body and guide the mind and body to fall peacefully asleep. Over the next 2-2.5 hours, the body doesn't need help to get great sleep, so our control layer keeps absorbing water until it's time to release the next round of ingredients. The third layer is when we release the last round of ingredients to keep the body from stirring and help you enjoy restorative, uninterrupted sleep.

templates.name: What is the powdery farina (epicuticular wax) on succulent leaves?
templates.content:
Succulents have a natural wax coating on their leaves that can sometimes look white and powdery. This coating both seals in water to reduce loss from evapotranspiration and helps reduce sunburn. A succulent grown in direct sun can develop a thicker coat of epicuticular wax, aka farina.

The farina is easily brushed off by hands, packing materials, neem oil, and others leaves. This is rarely harmful to the plant, but it does leave bare patches. Old farina will not usually grow back, but new leaves with full coverage will eventually replace the old, marked leaves.

templates.name: How often should a hybrid car be serviced?
templates.content: Owning and maintaining a hybrid will be no more stressful than a gasoline car. Indeed, the best thing about a hybrid car is how easily it will fit into your lifestyle and existing driving habits. If you're coming from owning a gasoline vehicle, the maintenance intervals and costs for a hybrid should be roughly the same. That's because your hybrid car's gasoline engine will still need regular oil changes, service for its heating and air conditioning system, cabin air filter replacements, and more. Thanks to regenerative braking, a hybrid car's brakes should last longer than on a gasoline car. However, due to the increased weight of the battery and motor, hybrid cars may need tire changes more frequently.

templates.name: What's the difference between the new LZRD tires and Trooper Tires?
templates.content: LZRD Tires measure at 4.5" wide. They're a true street tire made for extended range commuting which was designed with micro knurling to improve cornering grip, while balancing extended tire life. With good handling on the street, this modern tire is built to tackle the urban landscape with good wear over time. Trooper Tires, on the other hand, measure at 4" wide. They feature a hybrid micro tread designed for efficient rolling velocity. The tire was designed with a dense center tread pattern that extends tire life while an aggressive side tread provides cornering grip. With good handling on the street, this retro influenced tire is built to tackle the urban landscape with good wear over time.

templates.name: What is a ring and pinion gear pattern and why is it important?
templates.content: The pattern refers to how the ring gear and pinion gears mesh. There's a process used when reassembling a differential that optimizes ring gear and pinion tooth contact. The procedure involves changing the pinion position via shims in the carrier and repositioning the carrier. Dialing in the tolerance between the gears will ensure a smooth-running, long-lasting differential.

Our at-home kits come sterile so we don't recommend using components outside of the box. Our accuracy studies are based on the step-by-step instructions in our booklet and we see an uptick in results issues when the steps in our booklet aren't followed closely, even when the test is performed alongside a doctor or in a medical setting.

If you're only able to collect a small sample with the components in the box, please still send it in! Our lab provides one free retest kit if lab work cannot be finalized on the first try. If your order requires a retest, our team would reach out to help.

templates.name: Can I use the NIRA Pro Laser every other day and just double my pulses?
templates.content: For possible enhanced results, you may use the NIRA Pro Laser twice a day; in the morning and evening after cleansing and drying the treatment area. However, if you can only use it every other day, then doubling the number of pulses may help you get the treatment needed to help promote natural collagen production for younger looking skin. templates.name: Total Eye 3-in-1: Creases/shows wrinkles
templates.content:
We're sorry to hear you're experiencing this issue. With Total Eye 3-in-1 Renewal Therapy SPF 35, dispensing and applying the appropriate amount is very important. Be sure to dispense half a pump to the applicator tip and dot around both eyes. This half pump is enough to cover the entire orbital region (under eye to brow-including eyelids) for both eyes. This means Â¼ pump per eye. If you apply more than this, the extra product can collect in fine lines or settle in under-eye creases. If you are using it only for under the eye, as opposed to the entire eye area, you may require less product. Once the appropriate amount is applied, use the applicator tip to smooth the product over and then use your fingertips to blend- this will allow for a nice finish.

If you have any further concerns or would like to submit a return/exchange, please reach out to our Concierge team at concierge@colorescience.com.

This number can vary greatly from year to year again, depending on weather conditions.

templates.name: How do I get the shoes to glow?
templates.content:
We suggest leaving the sneakers near or under a light source/sun for the glow-in-the-dark features to work. Here are the recommended directions for use:

- Expose the shoes under light when it needs to be charged, it can be room light or natural sunlight
- If the shoes are stored in dark environment for a long time, glowing effect would weaken
- Keep the shoes away from over-heated temperature as it might damage the glowing effect
- Don't brush the glowing elements heavily as it might cause the glow effect to peel off or weaken

Due to the conservation of energy, the glowing effect performs the best in the first 6 months. The illumination density gets relatively weaker over time compared to the first 6 months.

templates.name: Do you use synthetic fragrance or flavors?
templates.content: We never use synthetic fragrance or flavor due to the lack of regulation surrounding these ingredients, unless we can verify the specific ingredient composition and sourcing. Under current policies, "fragrance" and "flavor" are considered trade secrets that can cover up anywhere from 10 to 30 additional ingredients that do not have to be explicitly disclosed on the ingredient label. While those ingredients may be perfectly safe, we feel customers have a right to know exactly what ingredients they're putting on their skin.

templates.name: Does it emit high emf?
templates.content: There are some electromagnetic emissions from the electronics in The Pod or Smart Bed in the same way that TVs, mobile phones, fridges, etc, produce EMF. For this, we have passed the relevant FCC and CE certifications which means the emissions are below the specified levels. We do adhere to all relevant safety standards. In particular, we are UL-certified, which has quite strict requirements, as well as a whole specification just for bed heaters. The cover runs on a low voltage system and is inherently safer than AC systems.

templates.name: What is the difference between the 3i, 7i and 8s models? (Frames)
templates.content: The 3i and 7i frames are built with high tensile steel, supporting riders up to 300 lbs. The 8s is built with our 4th generation aluminum alloy frame that weighs only 20 lbs and supports riders up to 300 lbs. All models now feature our new quick-release crank arm for easy transportation and storage, and the 8s model features a new user-adjustable caster angle, providing the option for more upright stability for beginners or more leaning performance for experienced riders. There's also a difference in colors - 3i and 7i come with the Blue frames and 8s with a Galaxy Black.

templates.name: What are the advantages of sterile cosmetics?
templates.content: Sterile cosmetics guarantee formulas with absolutely no preservatives or substances with an incidental preservative function (unlisted preservatives). Since preservatives do not affect the formula's efficacy, sterile cosmetics also mean that your skin is getting only what's essential. Sterile cosmetics offer unique safety for even the most sensitive and allergenic skin.

templates.content:
Good question. The Basic Rental option allows families to rent month-to-month! Once your SNOO arrives, your rental period begins and you can keep it as long as you need it (with a 1-month minimum). When ready to return, just initiate your return on the Rental Portal ( https://snoo-rental.happiestbaby.com/login ) before your next bill date and you'll get a return label right away! 

Billing stops as soon as the return label for SNOO has been scanned by the carrier to send back to us. Our team is also happy to review your rental account to tell you what date you should cancel it. Just fill out the form here: https://support.happiestbaby.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

templates.name: Where does your dairy come from?
templates.content: While McConnell's is a working dairy (The Old Dairy), we're now exclusively a dairy processing facility. McC's exited the dairy farming business in the mid-1960's when land values on the Central Coast skyrocketed. It was simply no longer feasible at that point to manage our own cows. Since that time, McConnell's has sourced our raw milk & cream from Producers Dairy, The Shehadey Family's 83-year-old dairy, based in Central California.

templates.name: There is water stuck in my Dash Slim lid. How do I get rid of this?
templates.content: Press and hold the button and unthread to the left. Remove the silicone ring and hand wash or place all parts on the top rack in the dishwasher top side up with the button depressed to open position. For best results hand dry with a clean dry cloth. Replace the silicone ring after 100% dry. Press and hold the button and rethread the closing disc to the right. Let me know how that goes!

There is a strong chance your package will be delivered within the next few days. If, however, you do not receive your order within 5 business days after the date your package is marked as delivered, please let us know so we can proceed with filing a claim to either get you a refund or a new package out to you. templates.name: How to fix my stuck throttle?
templates.content: Make sure that the throttle is not pinched by the front brake lever. If it gets pinched, it will separate the casing on the throttle, causing the shifter to stick. If your casing splits, just loosen up the front brake, reposition the casing (moving the side closest to the handlebars down toward the bottom of the throttle) and then re-tighten down the brake lever. You might need a 3mm Allen wrench to move the throttle, depending on how your cockpit is set up! Here's a screenshot for reference: https://prnt.sc/OOlEE81RBkm3

templates.content: The absence of forever chemicals in our pans means they won't release toxic fumes, even if you accidentally overheat your pan. Thermolon can withstand temperatures up to 850Â°F/450Â°C, something that would not be safe to do with a conventional nonstick frypan. templates.name: How do I care for my leather watchband?
templates.content: Regularly cleaning your leather watchband with a damp cloth will prolong the luster and life of the strap. To keep the watchband in good condition, treat your band with a mild leather treatment. This will prevent drying and cracking. It's best to remove your watch while sleeping and don't expose your leather band to water. templates.content:
Yes, Litter-Robot is a great solution for cats that spray or aim high when they go. The globe was designed to handle this, as the flange (rim) of the top half of the globe hangs over the bottom half of the globe, which itself is protected by a tough, impermeable flexible liner. If any liquid gets above the halfway mark (above the globe liner), it simply drips or drains down to the liner and then into the litter without collecting or pooling anywhere. 

This results in a clump forming at the perimeter of the litter bed, which is removed by the peeling action of the globe liner during a clean cycle. Constant spraying will require that you clean the interior of the globe more frequently to remove any residue, and, for deep cleaning, you can disassemble the globe into two halves (top and bottom).

templates.name: How do I enable walk mode (Aventure)?
templates.content: To enable Walk Mode, your Aventure ebike must be at a complete stop while in one of 5 pedal assist levels. Once in PAS 1 - 5, press and hold the " - " button on your handlebar controls for about 3 seconds. The bike will slowly move forward at 3.5 MPH / 6 KPH as long as you hold down the " - " button. Once you release the " - " button, Walk Mode will deactivate.

templates.name: What is the impact of charging on my electric bill?
templates.content: If you've been driving a gasoline car for a number of years, you know how much it costs you every week or month to put gas in your car. When you switch to an EV, the first thing you'll notice is that you're not buying gas anymore.But if you're charging your EV at home, you will notice that your monthly electric bill will increase. How much it increases varies with the cost of electricity in your area. On average, charging your electric car will cost you less than half as much as fueling a gasoline-powered vehicle.

templates.name: Can I treat with both the NIRA Precision and NIRA Pro Laser during the same session?
templates.content:
Yes, you may use both the NIRA Pro Laser and NIRA Precision Laser during the same session. However, make sure that you move the laser to a new spot for each pulse. If you treat the same spot twice in a row, the heat in your skin may build up to a point where you feel discomfort or pain. This is not recommended and should be avoided. If you feel warmth, and not pain, your NIRA laser is working properly to stimulate your natural collagen production.

In addition, we recommend waiting at least 1 minute before retreating to each area. Do not treat more than twice within a 1 hour period.

templates.name: Is dry ice safe?
templates.content: Dry ice is extremely safe for shipping seafood, especially because it keeps your seafood extremely cold until delivery. You'll need to take care when opening your package, however, as it can be dangerous to touch it or breathe it in directly. Open your box outside or in a large or ventilated space and allow the dry ice to dissipate for a few minutes before removing your seafood. Do not touch the ice with bare hands. You can pour any remaining dry ice into a sink or onto the ground outside to sublimate.

templates.name: Do your products have an EWG rating?
templates.content: We don't have plans to provide our proprietary formulations to the EWG. We're unsure how EWG analyzes products as we have never sent them our formulas or test reports for any products. All of our sunscreen products are compliant to the 2011 FDA sunscreen monograph, are registered with the FDA and have been reviewed by the Skin Cancer Foundation (SCF) Photobiology Committee and approved for SCF Seals of Recommendation. Our products pass 3 year long-term SPF stability testing, UVA FDA In-vitro Broad Spectrum testing, UVB static SPF determination and water resistant testing, Phototoxicity testing, 50 panel human repeat insult patch testing for non-irritation with dermatologist review, antimicrobial testing and clinical studies with our dermatologist partners. Our Sunforgettable Brush-On Sunscreen is safe. The concern with "powder" sunscreens has been the very small particle sizes used in some powder sunscreen formulations. The particle size that has risen concerns range in size from 1 and 100 nanometers. We can confirm that all of our Mineral Sunscreens have been tested and don't fall into the above mentioned small particle size. In addition, all our products are 100% free from parabens, phthalates, synthetic fragrance, animal testing, talc, dyes, mineral oils, drying alcohols & chemical sunscreen.

templates.name: How long does it take to charge a device with sunlight and then charge the phone
templates.content: It depends on the maximum sunlight and on the lantern, as each of the lanterns has a different charging time in the sun. The Titan can be fully charged in 16-20 hours, if it's in direct sunlight. The Nova takes 10-12 hours as it has a smaller solar panel and battery. The sunlight is partially filtered and indirect  through a window. Although the charging indicator may turn on, the light will not be charging efficiently indoors. templates.name: Why arenâ€™t your products calorie-free?
templates.content: The single biggest challenge that our team faced was to come up with effective formulas using clean, quality supplements and nutrients that also taste great! Many popular "zero calorie" drinks use artificial sweeteners to obtain that claim. The health risks of artificial sweeteners like sucralose and aspartame are becoming increasingly well-known. That's why we promise that they'll never be included in any of our products. Instead, we use natural, zero-calorie Stevia as part of our sweetener blend. Many consumers find the taste of Stevia on its own to be unpleasant, which is why we blend Stevia with raw organic blue agave. With that combination, you could say that we hit the low-calorie, low-glycemic "sweet spot." As an added plus, the agave provides a source of energy and it doesn't cause your insulin levels to spike like other sweeteners such as high-fructose corn syrup.

templates.name: Will my cat actually go inside the globe?
templates.content: Cats are generally curious and will investigate any new object. Cats that are already used to a covered litter box may be quicker to investigate. We recommend that you leave Litter-Robot turned off at first while your cat acclimates. Place Litter-Robot in the same location as the old litter box. You can leave the old litter box near Litter-Robot for a short time. Take a cup of litter from the old litter box and add it to the clean litter in Litter-Robot. The scent will be familiar, and your cat will be inclined to investigate. Once your cat ventures inside and feels the litter under their paws, they will know what to do.

templates.name: How do I claim the $7,500 EV tax credit?
templates.content: The federal government offers a $7,500 tax credit on the purchase of an EV if it meets certain criteria for local production and the origin of its battery components. You also need to meet requirements for household income. If your vehicle qualifies and you are below the household income threshold, you can claim the $7,500 credit by filing IRS Form 8936, "Qualified Plug-in Electric Drive Motor Vehicle Credit" with your annual tax return. You will need to provide your vehicle's VIN. Starting in 2024, a dealer will be able to claim the credit for you directly at the time of purchase.

templates.name: Cost of Duty
templates.content: We now offer the option to pay for duties & taxes at checkout (this wasn't possible in the past).The reason why you're experiencing high duties is because you go above your country's duty threshold when you add multiple items in your cart. Pro tip: the best way to game the system is to split your purchases into 2 or 3 chunks and complete the purchase separately. Because the price of a single product is often below the threshold, you don't need to pay high duties and are only charged for customs taxes. I do understand that this incurs some additional shipping costs but it's always minimal and much lower than the duties.

templates.name: My cashmere clothes are pilling. What do I do?
templates.content: Please note that pilling is a natural occurrence in cashmere. Pills are the little balls of fiber that start to gather on your sweater, typically in areas where there is friction. It can be quickly removed using a cashmere comb or by picking them off by hand.

templates.name: Are your accessories dishwasher safe?
templates.content: Our Coffee Mugs are dishwasher safe! As for our Mason Jars and Transparent Tumblers, we recommend handwashing them, so that the logo is better preserved :) Please note that the Mason Jar is not heat-resistant, so we recommend handwashing it using room temperature water. Our Transparent Tumbler is heat-resistant up to 105â„ƒ / 221Â°F, so we do not recommend washing it with water temperatures higher than this. For the Stainless Steel Straws, we recommend rinsing them under running water at room temperature, and allowing them to dry naturally, to help preserve the paint coat. Using warm water or a little soap inside the straws to handwash them is also OK. :) However, we do not recommend using a dishwasher to clean the Straws. Our To-Go Cups are not dishwasher safe, so we recommend handwashing them.

templates.name: Do your products contain Acrylamide?
templates.content: We don't add them to our product but it is something that happens during the cooking process. Some foods containing carbohydrates, a chemical called acrylamide form from sugars and amino acids that are naturally present. Acrylamide is found in many foods, including French fries, coffee, roasted grain-based coffee substitutes, roasted asparagus, canned sweet potatoes and pumpkin, canned black olives, roasted nuts, prune juice, breakfast cereals, crackers, cookies, bread, and toast. Because acrylamide is typically found in plant-based foods cooked with high heat. If you have concerns about eating products with acrylamides we would suggest consulting your healthcare provider.

templates.name: Why do you only offer frozen seafood?
templates.content: Although it may seem a paradox, frozen seafood is actually fresher and of better quality than fish that has not been frozen. Because of the delicate nature of fish, and the distances it may need to travel from the ocean to your table, the best way to maintain flavor and quality is to freeze it rapidly, at sea or on a nearby dock, as soon after the catch as possible. This also allows for it to be transported more slowly by land instead of by air, which reduces the carbon footprint.

templates.name: Can I sleep on my Nectar mattress without the cover on it?
templates.content: No, we do not recommend sleeping on the mattress without the cover. Removing the cover will void all warranties. Keeping the cover intact will help protect the integrity of the mattress so that you may enjoy amazing sleep for years to come. If you need to clean your Nectar mattress cover, we suggest spot cleaning affected areas with water and a mild detergent. For an easier method of keeping your mattress clean we strongly advise the use of a stain and water-resistant mattress protector (such as the ones we have available for purchase on our site) which may be removed and laundered from time to time and will keep your Nectar mattress in tip top condition!

templates.name: Does ARMRA Colostrum contain lactose?

templates.name: How do I get a PIN number?
templates.content:
To request a PIN, please sign in with your personal email address and password. Find and click your organization's name. From your organization profile page, find the billing accounts and look for the blue link that reads "Need a PIN?" and click that link.

Select whether you have forgotten your PIN, or are requesting a new PIN. Enter your billing account number.

It will take about 24 hours before a PIN will be e-mailed to you, and another 24 hours before that PIN will be active for you to use.

Every statement account can only have one PIN number. Therefore, you should check with your Financial Secretary or the person who handles ordering for your church. Many times an account already has a PIN and you may not realize it. Also, many accounts require some type of Purchase restrictions.

templates.name: Whatâ€™s the difference between your Daily Vaginal Lotion and your V Relief Serum?
templates.content: The Daily Vaginal Lotion is recommended for mild to moderate dryness, along with no pain or sensitivity like itching, burning or stinging. Use of the lotion over time helps support the skin moisture barrier of your vulva and vagina when it is thinning and dry. Key ingredients like niacinamide help to restore intimate skin with daily use, while coconut oil and safflower oil help to provide hydration and moisture. If you are feeling dry, but not necessarily feeling pain, sensitivity to touch, or burning, the lotion is a great choice for you. This lotion formulation is slightly thicker than the V Relief Serum, and can be used daily for maintaining a healthier, more nourished vulva and vagina. V relief serum is for severe dryness, itching stinging, and burning. If you are experiencing any of the following, V Relief Serum is for you: Your vulva and vagina are sensitive to the touch; You feel pain, burning, itching, or stinging when applying products, wiping, or intimacy; You feel discomfort and severe dryness.

templates.name: Cell Rejuvenating Priming Moisturizer is pilling  (US, UK, AU, CA & FR)
templates.content:
Pilling can occur when either there has not been anough dry time between products or when too much product has been applied.

To avoid this moving forward, I would recommend firstly to assess how much product you are using. You should have between 1-2 pumps for the face and neck. Next I would suggest allowing more time to let the Cell Rejuvenating Priming Moisturizer sink into the skin before moving on to any other make up base product.

If you still see issues you may also wish to review the type of applicator you are using when applying your base products as these may be contributing to any "lifting" of product. I hope this helps!

templates.name: Proper Hydration: What is the importance of hydration?
templates.content: The human body is comprised of roughly 60% water. Every single cell in the human body needs water to function. Losing just 2% of your body's water can result in mild dehydration. Drinking water and replacing electrolytes serves a wide range of purposes in our bodies including removing waste through urine; controlling body temperature, heart rate, and blood pressure; and maintaining a healthy metabolism.

templates.name: What size are the individual pieces? (Edit the example)
templates.content:
To determine the size of the puzzle pieces, you can take the dimensions of the puzzle, multiply them, and divide that by the number of pieces. 

Example: 
16 x 10 = 160 sq inches
160 divided by 100 pieces = approx 1.6" square, so the pieces are about an inch and a half square.

templates.name: How often should I use the Nira Pro Laser?
templates.content:
Consistency is key when it comes to stunning results. The NIRA Pro Laser works similarly to exercise and muscle, it takes time for the collagen to rebuild, and the best results are seen with continued routine use.

For best results with the NIRA Pro Laser, treat your skin daily for 90 days or more according to the instructions. For possible enhanced results, you may treat twice a day; in the morning and the evening. We recommend waiting at least 1-minute before retreating to each area. Daily usage is recommended on an ongoing basis to maintain results.

templates.name: How do I assemble the Kidsâ€™ Mattress?
templates.content:
Before attempting to assemble your kids' mattress, please note that the cover and core will arrive in 2 separate boxes. Ensure receipt of both boxes and follow the steps below:

1. Unroll cover (arrives unzipped as top and bottom layers) and set top cover aside
2. Lift side walls of bottom cover into a box shape
3. Fit all 3 core segments inside, making certain that all edges (especially the top edges) align flush against each other (no bumps or spaces in between)
4. Place top cover over assembled bottom cover and core
5. Zip closed, tucking front flap in between core and side walls

Hope this helps and please let me know if there's anything else I can assist you with.

templates.name: What is Makgeolli?
templates.content:
Makgeolli is the oldest alcoholic beverage in Korea. Made from rice, nuruk (traditional fermentation starter), and water, it has a smooth body and subtly tart taste profile, which comes from lactic acid bacteria. It is typically a touch sweet, with an average Alcohol By Volume (ABV) of 6%.

The name Makgeolli literally means 'roughly filtered,' and yes - it is roughly filtered! Makgeolli has an opaque white appearance due to the delicate rice sediment remaining in the drink. The sediment greatly enhances the flavor, body and aroma of the drink, so be sure to give Makgeolli a quick stir or shake before consuming!

templates.name: Do I need to rinse my Cocobrush before use?
templates.content: Yes! Love your Cocobrush and your Cocobrush will love you back. Cocobrush bristles should be rinsed thoroughly with hot water before and after every use to wash away debris and bacteria. Use steamy water (watch your hands!) for the best sanitization. After brushing and rinsing, store your Cocobrush upright to air dry, which helps reduce bacterial growth. Take care of your Cocobrush, and it will last you about three-to-four months until the next replacement.

templates.name: What to know before taking the SneakPeek test / returning the sample
templates.content: It's important that no males are present or have any contact with the contents of the test box before, during, and after sample collection (once blood sample is secured and sealed in the return shipping envelope, it can be handled by anyone). Wash hands thoroughly with soap and warm water before opening or handling any of the test box and its contents. We recommend you rewash your hands thoroughly again prior to actually taking the test. Read through all instructions and make sure to follow them thoroughly, then collect the sample preferably on a kitchen or dining room table area. Bathroom counter tops aren't recommended. Clean the table surface with warm soapy water or a household cleaner before collecting your sample. Make sure to activate your kit barcode (found on the inside top flap of your test kit) before shipping your sample and don't forget to take a picture of your Tracking Label before mailing so that you can track your sample on its way back to us. Only use the prepaid return shipping we supply to return your sample.

templates.name: Do hybrid cars get federal tax credit?
templates.content: Conventional hybrid cars are not eligible for the federal tax credit, but they may be eligible for other benefits in some regions, such as access to high occupancy vehicle (HOV) lanes. However, some plug-in hybrid vehicles qualify for the federal tax credit. The list includes the Jeep Wrangler 4xe, Jeep Grand Cherokee 4xe, Chrysler Pacifica PHEV, Lincoln Aviator Grand Touring PHEV, and Lincoln Corsair Grand Touring PHEV.

templates.name: Liposomal Vitamin C vs Buffered Vitamin C
templates.content: Buffered vitamin C is ascorbic acid mixed with an alkaline mineral to control the acidity, thereby reducing, but not eliminating, the chance of gastric distress from the combination of natural stomach acid and ascorbic acid. Liposomal C is ascorbic acid enclosed in a liposome made from substances that parallel the architecture of the body cells. This allows the vitamin to pass through the digestive system, into our bloodstream for cellular delivery. That means you get more C per capsule. One capsule contains 500 mg of Vitamin C. We suggest a 1000 mg per day but if you're new to Liposomal C, we suggest you start low and go slow. During times where you are exposed to a virus or are sick, we recommend increasing the dosage but spacing it throughout the day.

templates.name: Will my perfume change over time?
templates.content: One thing people don't often talk about is our perception of scent changing over time. For example, if you're in a room with a strong aroma like a skunk, after a while your brain adjusts to filter it out and you won't notice it as much after a while. The same happens when we wear something over and over again. That is one of the reasons we always suggest rotating a wardrobe of fragrances.

templates.name: Why is it important that the frames fit you properly?
templates.content: Every human head is unique, each face has different measurements and no other eyes on earth are exactly like yours. Since eyeglass frames fit certain face shapes differently, it is important to observe how a frame rests on your unique facial features. For example, if the bridge area does not fit properly on your nose then the glasses will slide down, affecting not only how they look and feel but also how you see. Also, if glasses are too narrow and tight, then they may put pressure on your face while restricting your peripheral vision. Wearing lenses with incorrect alignment specifications will commonly cause issues such as visual discomfort, blurriness, eye strain, "pulling sensation" and headaches.

templates.name: How do I take care of my DreamCloud mattress?
templates.content:
The best way to care for your DreamCloud mattress is to ensure its placed on a firm, solid surface (like a bed base), that's structurally capable of supporting the weight of your mattress plus its sleepers. Aside from that, you can also care for your mattress by:

â€¢ Changing your bedding once a week to reduce dead skin cells, oils and sweat from coming into contact with your mattress.
â€¢ Rotating your DreamCloud every three months to encourage even wear across the mattress surface. (No need to flip it though!)
â€¢ Cleaning dust particles off of your mattress by vacuuming it once a month.
â€¢ Installing a mattress pad or protector to protect your DreamCloud from spills and other accidental damages.

templates.name: What's the difference between Polarized, Non-Polarized and PureBlend Lenses?
templates.content:
Good question! Polarized lenses have an additional anti-reflective coating of film to filter bright, reflected light as well as ambient light, reducing glare during driving, water sports, and other outdoor activites. 

Non-polarized lenses do not reduce glare as well as polarized lenses, but are equally efficient at protecting against UV rays and offer enhanced clarity when viewing LCD screens on digital devices. 

Our new PureBlend lens is lightweight and offers superior clarity, and durability. It is available in polarized and non-polarized options. I'm just here if you have other questions.

templates.name: How to measure PD at home?
templates.content: Just follow these steps. First, stand 8in. away from a mirror and hold a ruler against your brow. Close your right eye then align the ruler's 0 mm with the center of your left pupil. Look straight then close your left eye and open your right eye. The mm line that lines up to the center of your right pupil is your PD.

templates.name: I'm not getting much of a scent throw from my candles. What am I doing wrong?
templates.content: There are many variables that can cause a candle to not have a good scent throw when the candle is burning. Some of these factors include how much fragrance you use in making the candle, the temperature at which the fragrance is added, the size of the wick, what type of wax you are using, too much dye in the candle, etc. Our fragrance oils are high-quality oils and most likely the problem is with one or several of these factors. It is always very important to do test burns when you try something new.

templates.name: Will OEM lug nuts work on ICON Alloys?
templates.content: No, OEM lug nuts are designed for a different mounting style than what's found on ICON Alloys. The lug nuts required for all ICON Alloys are 60Â° taper acorn style lug nuts. There are several options available, (hex, spline, tamper proof etc.) as long as the seat remain a 60Â° taper acorn. This is a very common lug type and is available at most auto parts stores or wheel & tire centers.

templates.name: Why was Total T reformulated?
templates.content: We're continuously scouring the latest research to make sure that our testosterone boosting formula includes the most innovative and scientifically sound ingredients. Nugenix Total-T is an upgraded formula from Nugenix Free Testosterone that was scientifically formulated to provide comprehensive testosterone support. To further enhance the health-promoting benefits of Testofen, we have added two validated ingredients, elevATP and boron, which provide support for muscle size and free testosterone. Eurycoma longifolia extract was also added based on its strong research support and traditional use. In addition, we listened to our customer's feedback and changed citrulline malate from a 1:1 to a 2:1 ratio (two parts citrulline to one part malate) to lessen any potential gastrointestinal side effects that may have been previously caused by the higher amount of malate.

templates.name: Vitamin A deficiency symptoms?
templates.content: Vitamin A deficiency symptoms include night blindness and other eye-related symptoms, including clouding of the cornea. Vitamin A deficiency also leaves you more prone to infections, skin irritation, stunted growth, and fertility issues. As a fat-soluble Vitamin, Vitamin A deficiency is relatively rare. It is diagnosed by examination and blood tests.

templates.name: Why does my Finish Gel have dull streak marks on the surface?
templates.content:
It is crucial to ensure you are applying enough Activator to your nail, make sure to dunk the brush back into the bottle before moving on to the next nail.

After the second coat of activator is applied, let it dry for 1-2 minutes before you apply the first coat of finish gel. The first layer of Finish Gel needs to be applied quickly, in 2-3 quick strokes. The second coat of Finish Gel can be applied more slowly and carefully and be sure to cap the front edge of the nails.

templates.name: What's the difference between the regular and tall inseam measurements?

templates.name: Why isn't my fragrance oil bottle completely full or seem to have different amounts in each bottle depending on the fragrance?
templates.content: Our fragrance bottles are filled by weight, not volume. Because the densities of the fragrances are different, the fill levels in the bottles will vary as well. The fruity and floral fragrances will tend to have higher fill levels because they are less dense. Fragrances that have a vanilla, cinnamon or nutty smell will tend to have a lower fill level because they are usually more dense. Even though the fragrances have different densities, all will contain the same amount of fragrance by weight.

templates.name: Do I need to add fat to my sausage? What type of fat is suggested?
templates.content: We recommend using 20% pork or pork fat to 80% lean meat. The fat is added to the meat to make up the total amount of meat needed. If you are making a 10 lb. batch of summer sausage you would use 8 lbs. of lean ground meat and 2 lbs. of pork fat. We do not recommend the use of suet in place of fat. Suet has a higher melting point than the sausage cooking temperature. When the meat is fully cooked the suet would not be melted completely, leaving suet particles in the sausage.

templates.name: Capsule: Number of pours
templates.content:
Our Capsules are designed to deliver approximately 15 5oz, (150 ml), pours per capsule. However, capsule longevity will vary a bit depending on how you use the Coravin Wine System and how frequently you pressurize each bottle. The volume of gas into the bottle will dictate the volume of wine that pours. This volume is controlled by the person using the device. The longer you hold the trigger the more gas is used. It is more that the amount of gas used per pour will affect how many pours you get from a cartridge. If you want a smaller pour and use less gas to facilitate that pour you will get more pours per cartridge. If you want a larger pour you may receive less.

This video may help as well: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=shWVQHLliCU

templates.name: What is the difference between fresh and frozen seafood?
templates.content:
The term "fresh" holds little meaning in the seafood business - supermarkets often apply it to mean either previously frozen seafood or never-frozen seafood, even if caught many days or weeks prior.

The relationship of freshness to quality comes in how long the fish remains unfrozen between the harvest (or catch) and consumption, as well as the number of times it cycles between frozen and thawed. Deep freezing, like all of KnowSeafood's products, pauses that time, meaning our blast frozen seafood, thawed only when you choose to cook it, delivers the freshest possible product, other than buying it on the dock.

templates.name: Why is my LG Refrigerator Door Hard to Open?
templates.content:
After a time of inactivity, you may notice that it's harder to open the doors to your refrigerator. This is because when the doors are opened, warm air enters the refrigerator. As the warm air cools, it can create a vacuum. If the door is hard to open, wait a few minutes to allow the air pressure to equalize, and then try opening the doors again to see if it opens easier. Inspect the seals (gaskets) around the doors to be certain that they are clean and free of debris. If the seals are dirty or sticky, this will make the doors hard to open. If necessary, clean the seals with warm water and a mild detergent. Be certain to rinse the seals well. Please don't use harsh or abrasive cleaners.

Check the arrangement of food and other items in your refrigerator so that nothing is interfering with the functionality of the doors. Check the shelves and bins for any items that may stick out too far and rearrange them if necessary.

It's also normal for the doors to be somewhat difficult to open if your unit is new. It's also important to be sure that the unit is leveled and that the doors are aligned. Kindly refer to your owner's manual for information regarding the leveling of the doors.

templates.name: How do I give myself a manicure?
templates.content:
We have some great resources on our site! Check out our Mani 101 guide here: https://oliveandjune.com/pages/oliveuniversity We also recommend:

1. Preparing - You'll want to make sure you're avoiding hand washing and showering for at least 30 mins to an hour before you paint
2. Make sure you are not using a separate base coat, as our polish has a built-in one.
3. Prep nails with the Nail Polish Remover Pot, and avoid touching your hair, towels, etc so no oil can transfer to your nail bed.
4. Then, always paint 2 - 3 VERY THIN coats and give each one at least 5 - 10 minutes of dry time before applying another. 
5. Clean up any polish that is on your cuticles, and make sure it is only on the nail itself. That will help prevent any peeling around your cuticles!
6. Seal with your Top Coat and reapply every 2 - 3 days to really lock in the mani and keep it fresh!

templates.name: What are you doing to be more sustainable?
templates.content:
Trust us when we say our sustainability goals are as ambitious as waking up before the alarm. These goals are designed to innovate and better how we design and manufacture, which means that we: thoughtfully consider and care about the materials we source, the production methods we use, how we distribute, and our practices at our headquarters and Bedroom locations.

In addition to our fabric selection and how we manufacture, we are also doing what we can by minimizing production quantities with demand-oriented ordering to minimize unnecessary waste and unnecessary production. 

We are on a journey of progress and as we continue to grow and evolve as a business, we are committed to sharing with you, the actions being taken towards positive change to care for the planet and its people.

To us, being sustainable is about responsible and ethical choices and doing our best to do what's right for our employees, workers, our customers, and the world around us!

templates.name: Why would a sample be inconclusive?
templates.content: First, we assure you this doesn't mean anything is wrong! We may just need a second look. templates.name: Tall gear, short gear, high gear, deep gear, what does it all mean?
templates.content: Gearheads have their own vernacular so knowing the lingo will help you communicate with your mechanic. We're talking about gear ratio. Tall gears produce a lower numeric ratio i.e. 3.08, 3.73 (or lower), while short gears or deep gears refer to higher numeric ratios i.e. 4.88, 5.29 (or higher). Numerically higher gear ratios produce more torque, are quicker off the line, and deliver a lower top speed. Conversely, lower numeric gear ratios produce less torque, are slower at launch, and deliver a higher top speed. For more on how to pick the right ratio, check out this video here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kaq8EbytIms&ab_channel=YukonGear%26Axle

templates.name: Switching from puppy to adult food
templates.content: That's great! Generally, puppies can start transitioning to adult food when they reach about 80% of their expected adult size. This typically occurs around 12 months for small to medium breeds and 18-24 months for larger breeds but we suggest confirming with your Vet first! What is your puppy currently eating (puppy dry food or puppy ancient grains)? Are you also feeding your puppy any other products? If you're serving regular puppy dry food, I suggest Turkey and Chicken dry food, and if you're serving puppy ancient grains, I suggest Salmon & Ancient Grains dry food. Those are our most popular dry food products. Also, you can add in freeze dried raw to sprinkle on top. It's great for nutrition and pups LOVE it.

templates.name: Do I need to flip my mattress from big fig?

It's important, however, to "rotate" your Big Fig Mattress on a regular basis, every month during the first six months and every 3-4 months after that. The more frequent, the better! Simply exchange the head and foot of your mattress to help distribute the upholstery materials and comfort impressions to fully utilize your mattress. Comfort impressions will occur naturally and aren't structural defects.

templates.name: What is the difference between the Shaker Bottle and Flex Bottle?
templates.content:
In short, the difference is in the lids. Both bottles feature the same 26oz insulated cup. Our Shaker bottles feature spill/leak-proof, pop-top style lids with removable agitator. The patented agitator can be used to silently and seamlessly blend nutrition shakes, infuse your drink with fresh fruit and strain ice. They are best suited for cold nutrition shakes, water and sports drinks.  

Our Flex bottles feature our unique Flex Lids which offer two ways to sip. There is an edge drinking hole-similar to a traditional coffee cup as well as the option to sip from a removable straw (included). Both edge drinking hole and straw port can be sealed so there is no need to worry about spills/leaks while on-the-go!  Flex lids do not feature our removable agitator. Our Flex bottles are great for both hot and cold beverages including coffee, water, tea, smoothies and carbonated drinks.

templates.name: Would the Silk-expert IPL/Silk-expert Pro IPL help get rid of hairs permanently?
templates.content:
The FDA defines permanent hair reduction as: a long-term stable reduction in the number of hairs re-growing after a treatment regime. However, this reduction isn't required to encompass 100% of hairs treated; just a certain percentage. Therefore, although it is true that some ongoing "maintenance" treatments are required, the Silk-expert IPL meets the FDA definition for permanent hair reduction.  

When used as directed, clinical trial participants showed on average 44% less hair 6 months after their last treatment and 36% less hair 12 months after their last treatment when compared to hair counts taken before treatment. Actual results did vary from person to person.

templates.name: what is the difference between curl corps defining cream and curl corps gel?
templates.content: Curl corps gel lightly moisturizes, controls frizz, seals in moisture, and holds the definition of curls for a long-lasting style. On the other hand, Curl corps cream deeply moisturizes curls and enhances natural texture by encouraging curl formation. To get the benefits of both products, we recommend cocktailing them together and applying to damp hair before air drying or diffusing. Different hair types may get best results from different ratios of the cream and gel, so experiment with the combination that works best for you!

templates.name: How do you enable the different class modes?
templates.content:
To change the riding mode on your bike, you must do this through the app. Toggling through the 2 levels on the bike's display is for selecting pedal assist power only. For example, "+4 Level" on the bike's display only increases the amount of assistance the motor provides while pedaling.
 
Please open the Super73 App, go into "Vehicle" in the Menu, then scroll through "Mode Selection". Just slide the cursor to which mode you would like to be in:

* Class 1 Pedal Assist only up to 20MPH (Throttle is Disabled)
* Class 2 Pedal Assist or Throttle up to 20MPH.

Once you've chosen, click "Save."
