templates.name: Issues with anchors and compact cameras
templates.content: We're aware of this issue where strap eyelets are too small for the cord on our anchors. You can try a couple of things; first, thread it through with tweezers, pliers, or dental floss which works surprisingly well. If your eyelet is still too small, try using a split ring - https://www.amazon.com/Hama-Split-Rings-Triangular-027902/dp/B00006JCX6#customerReviews to connect the anchor to the eyelet. Your camera should have come with these or your can get them from a local store or Amazon. Attach the ring to the eyelet, and then attach the anchor to the ring. We're still researching how we can make our micro anchor cords skinnier while retaining the same strength, and weâ€™re even considering making custom split rings for this purpose! In the meantime hopefully one of these solutions will work for you.

templates.name: Recommendation for split rings
templates.content: Hereâ€™s a link to split rings we recommend from Amazon: https://www.amazon.com/Hama-Split-Rings-Triangular-27902/dp/B00006JCX6/ref=sr_1_1?dchild=1&keywords=B00006JCX6&qid=1599372847&sr=8-1

templates.name: Where can I buy external stowage strap for travel line
templates.content: You can get it from here: https://www.peakdesign.com/products/replacement-external-carry-strap

templates.name: Does the ball head on the travel tripod work for other tripods?
templates.content: No, our ball head only works on our tripod.

templates.name: What is the length of the shell?
templates.content: Approximate shell lengths are 8" for the small one, 9.5" for the medium one, and 11.5" for the large one. You can see more info here - https://support.peakdesign.com/hc/en-us/articles/205337315-Choosing-the-Right-Size-Shell-For-You

templates.name: What is the handle drop length on the tote bag?
templates.content: The drop length for the v1 tote of handles is approx 12".

templates.name: Dimensions of the 3L sling bag flex folder
templates.content: The approximate dimensions of it are 19cm x 15cm x .8cm (7.5" x 5.9" x .3") and no other ones will fit as they're custom made for each one.

templates.name: Recommendation for pan or fluid head?
templates.content: You can check this out: https://www.bhphotovideo.com/c/product/553886-REG/Manfrotto_128RC_128RC_QR_Micro_Fluid.html/overview

templates.name: Customer has no receipt available for warranty
templates.content: No worries! If you don't have a copy of your receipt, you can provide a photo of the damaged item next to a sheet of paper with the current date written on it, or write down the date you purchased and the location of purchase. It will serve as your proof of purchase.

templates.name: Does embroidery void the warranty?
templates.content: It doesn't void the warranty.

templates.name: Does your wallet have RIF?
templates.content: Not currently and we have no plans at this time unless backer censuses it otherwise throughout the campaign.

templates.name: How many cards can the wallet hold?
templates.content: Both wallet styles can hold up to 7 cards.

templates.name: Will the credit card sized tripod fit in your wallet?
templates.content: Yes, you could probably get the mobile tripod in your wallet, depending on the size. It will fit in our wallet, but the magnets might cause issues if you try to put cards in there too as there's no shield.

templates.name: Belt opening for field pouch
templates.content: The belt loop has about 2.25" opening.

templates.name: What's the difference between dual and standard plate?
templates.content: You can see the differences between all our plates here: https://support.peakdesign.com/hc/en-us/articles/201291383-What-s-the-difference-between-Capture-s-plates-kits-

templates.name: Is your lens kit compatible with Z mount for nikon?
templates.content: No, unfortunately it isn't.

templates.name: Is the $8 fee per item or per order?
templates.content: It would be $8 per return, not per item.

templates.name: What type of charging cable does your car mount come with?
templates.content: It's available in charging and non-charging models. Charging model comes with 12V lighter plug adapter and easily-routable power cord.

templates.name: Will I still get lifetime warranty if I order the slide lite from Moment?
templates.content: Yes, you will.

templates.name: Can a Kirk L bracket mount to your Capture?
templates.content: It won't work directly but check this out: https://support.peakdesign.com/hc/en-us/articles/201292143-Using-Capture-with-an-L-bracket

templates.name: How do I clean / wash my product?
templates.content: Check this out to get more info on that: https://support.peakdesign.com/hc/en-us/articles/360025917591-How-to-Clean-Your-Peak-Design-Product

templates.name: Dimensions for the everyday backpack 20L
templates.content: Here are detailed dimensions for the 20L everyday backpack - https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/2986/1172/files/Dimensions-EDB-20L-1.jpg?v=1595354699 The maximum laptop carry for the 20L is 15"

templates.name: Dimensions for the Everyday Backpack Zip 15L
templates.content: Here are detailed dimensions for the 15L Everyday Backpack Zip - https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/2986/1172/files/Dimensions-EDBZ-15L-1.jpg?v=1589219151 The maximum laptop carry for the 15L is 13"

templates.name: Dimensions for the Everyday Totepack 20L
templates.content: Here are detailed dimensions for the 20L Everyday Totepack - https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/2986/1172/files/Dimensions-EDTP-1.jpg?v=1589219151 The maximum laptop carry is 15".

templates.name: Dimensions for the Everyday Tote 15L
templates.content: Here are detailed dimensions for the 15L Everyday Tote - https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/2986/1172/files/Dimensions-EDT-1.jpg?v=1589219151 The maximum laptop carry is 13".

templates.name: Dimensions for the Everyday Sling 3L
templates.content: Here are detailed dimensions for the 3L Everyday Sling - https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/2986/1172/files/Dimensions-EDS-3L-1.jpg?v=1589219151 There are no options for a laptop/tablet carry.

templates.name: Laptop/Tablet carry dimensions for the Travel Backpack 45L
templates.content: The maximum laptop carry dimensions are: 40.6cm x 28cm x 2.5cm (16" x 11" x 1"), and the maximum tablet carry dimensions are: 24cm x 19cm x 1.5cm (9.5" x 7.5" x 0.6").

templates.name: What are the differences in your straps?
templates.content: You can compare our straps here - https://www.peakdesign.com/pages/compare-straps to have a better view on which would work best for you!

templates.name: How can I register my product?
templates.content: You can register your product here - https://www.peakdesign.com/apps/pd-registration

templates.name: Dimensions for all types of camera cube dividers
templates.content: The dimensions for all the camera cube dividers are 16cm (6.30cm ) x 20cm (7.87in) x 1cm (.39in) for the large divider; 16cm (6.3in) x 33cm (13in) x 1cm (.39in) for the small divider; As for the shelf divider,  L (blue line) 7.6" x W 2.8" x H (red line) 5.6";  long divider: L 13.9" x 5.9" H 6.1"; and XS divider: L 4.8 x H 5.6.

templates.name: Dimensions for all Everyday Bag Dividers
templates.content: Check out the dimensions of all our Everyday Bag dividers here - https://prnt.sc/w45qos

templates.name: Your anchor links won't work on my camera/split rings
templates.content: Our anchor links are designed to work with OEM straps or standard straps that terminate in webbing, not split rings. Like here: https://prnt.sc/wckbvu In theory you could attach the split rings at the end of your strap to the hole in the anchor links, but thats kind of a janky set up! If you like the look of a rope strap, there are lots of sellers on etsy that make rope straps with our anchor links - https://www.google.com/search?q=rope+camera+strap+peak+design+anchor+links&source=lm[%E2%80%A6]l=en&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwju7qKSlvTtAhVawJcIHT8zDogQ_AUoAXoECAEQAQ

templates.name: Will my lens fit into into your camera cube?
templates.content: Possibly, check out this link and you can measure it - https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/2986/1172/products/camera-cube-size_1024x1024.jpg?v=1587924443  or give me your measurements and I'll check.

templates.name: Are your tripods sand/saltwater resistant?
templates.content: We recommend taking all components apart and thoroughly cleaning all sand from it with a "can of air" and then wiping down all components with fresh water. Check out this maintenance and tuning video as your guide - https://support.peakdesign.com/hc/en-us/articles/360037879212-Peak-Design-Travel-Tripod-Maintenance-Tuning

templates.name: What generation is the Duffelpack 65L?
templates.content: There's only one generation of the Travel Duffelpack 65L and it came out on June 2019.

templates.name: Laptop/Tablet carry dimensions for the Everyday Messenger 13L
templates.content: The maximum laptop carry dimensions are: 22.9cm x 2.5cm x 33cm (9" x 1" x 13") so it holds a 13â€ Macbook Pro/Laptop. And the maximum tablet carry dimensions are: 30.6cm x 22.1cm x .7 cm (12" x 8.7" x 0.3").

templates.name: Can I add a strap to the wash pouch?
templates.content: Unfortunately the wash pouch isn't "strap compatible" but I'll pass this on to the design team for future consideration.

templates.name: The center column on my Carbon Tripod isn't in carbon fiber, why?
templates.content: We have actually switched to an aluminum center column on the carbon tripod due to stiffness and damping reasons. We had a Kickstarter update in Nov 2019, you can access the full video here - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FFm-pFKrqIU

templates.name: With the Tripod, do you recommend mounting standard plates to larger zooms or directly to camera?
templates.content: Yes, you can have the plate on all of your large zooms, as well as camera for smaller lenses. Some folks attach the plate to their lens foot especially for large lenses to distribute the weight and achieve nice set up.

templates.name: Differences between the Aluminum and Carbon Travel Tripod
templates.content: Check out well detailed differences between both tripods here - https://support.peakdesign.com/hc/en-us/articles/360033182911-The-Aluminum-Vs-Carbon-Travel-Tripod

templates.name: Will your Capture work with an L-Bracket?
templates.content: You can check this out for more clarity on that - https://support.peakdesign.com/hc/en-us/articles/201292143-Using-Capture-with-an-L-bracket

templates.name: How strong is the magnetic connection between the universal adapter and the universal bike mount? Will it fall off?
templates.content: The connection between the universal adapter and the universal bike mount is both magnetic and mechanical. To fail, either the adapter adhesive would have to fail, or the mechanical parts would have to break. In short, the system is designed to support biking. It might fail/fall off in a serious incident like a hard crash.

templates.name: Are your products vegan/animal friendly?
templates.content: Most of our items are vegan, but here's a list to provide guidance if you don't want to buy PD gear that contains animal products - https://support.peakdesign.com/hc/en-us/articles/115003847783-Vegan-Animal-Friendly-Products

templates.name: Free shipping
templates.content: We offer free standard shipping for all US orders!

templates.name: Social media
templates.content: Give us a follow on IG here https://www.instagram.com/peakdesign/ and FB here - https://www.facebook.com/peakdesignltd

templates.name: Phone support
templates.content: We don't offer phone support right now but I'd be happy to help you over text, let me know what I can do for you?

templates.name: Cancel/edit order
templates.content: We actually factor in a 5-hour window from the time when the order is placed to when it drops to our fulfillment center for processing, just in case you need to change something. If you'd like to modify your shipping info or the contents of your order, the best way to do it is to cancel the order and place a new one. Please log in to your account to see if this option is available. Refunds generally take 2-3 business days to appear back on your credit card. You can log in to your account here: https://www.peakdesign.com/account/

templates.name: Where are your items made / manufactured
templates.content: All our products are currently manufactured in 2 factories. Our soft goods are made in Ho Chi Minh, located in Southern Vietnam and our hard goods are made in Dongguan, an urban and industrial city in China's Pearl River Delta.

templates.name: Wholesale inquiries
templates.content: The best way to discuss wholesale is to email us directly at info@peakdesign.com Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Brand ambassador / sponsorship
templates.content: The best way to discuss this is to email us directly at info@peakdesign.com Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Dimensions for the everyday backpack 30L
templates.content: Here are the dimensions for the 30L Everyday Backpack - https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/2986/1172/files/Dimensions-EDB-30L-1.jpg?v=1595354699 The maximum laptop carry for the 30L is 16".

templates.name: Dimensions for the Everyday Backpack Zip 20L
templates.content: Here are the dimensions for the 20L Everyday Backpack Zip - https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/2986/1172/files/Dimensions-EDBZ-20L-1.jpg?v=1589219151 The maximum laptop carry for the 20L is 15".

templates.name: Dimensions for the Everyday Sling 6L
templates.content: Here are detailed dimensions for the 6L Everyday Sling - https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/2986/1172/files/Dimensions-EDS-6L-1.jpg?v=1589219151 The maximum tablet carry is 11"

templates.name: Dimensions for the Everyday Sling 10L
templates.content: Here are the dimensions for the 10L Everyday Sling - https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/2986/1172/files/Dimensions-EDS-10L-1.jpg?v=1589219151 The maximum laptop/tablet carry is 13".

templates.name: Will the camera cube fit into my everyday backpack?
templates.content: No, sorry about that! The camera cubes don't work in the ED backpacks, only the travel line.

templates.name: Do you send invoice/receipt with order?
templates.content: For domestic orders, no invoice will be sent. Just a packing slip without prices.

templates.name: Are the packing cubes washable?
templates.content: Yes, check this out for instructions on how to take care of them - https://support.peakdesign.com/hc/en-us/articles/360025917591-How-to-Clean-Your-Peak-Design-Product

templates.name: Does the tripod come with a phone mount?
templates.content: Yes it has a built-in and stowable mobile mount.

templates.name: Cancel/edit order (outside 5-hour window or if "change order" button is grayed out for the customer).
templates.content: I can check if thatâ€™s possible. Whatâ€™s the order number and email it's under? Also, can you please confirm the change youâ€™d like to make?

templates.name: I have the Capture (v1/v2/v3), is it compatible with my (brand) plate?
templates.content: We actually put together a great article about this with detailed information on compatibility which you can check out here: https://support.peakdesign.com/hc/en-us/articles/201291383-What-s-the-difference-between-Capture-s-plates-kits-

templates.name: How big/wide of a strap can I use with the Anchor Mount housing?
templates.content: Here's an image showing the measurements of the housing's openings which you can use to determine if the strap you're using will work: https://prnt.sc/18m232s

templates.name: Can the travel tripod be set up vertically?
templates.content:
The Tripod can be used to achieve a number of angles but you do have to rotate how the plate is engaged within the tripod to get to some of them.
See some more info and a demo from one of our Lead Tripod designers as he walks through some of these here https://support.peakdesign.com/hc/en-us/articles/360040053251

templates.name: Does the everyday hip belt fit the field pouch?
templates.content: The Field Pouch won't work with the Hip Belt but you can definitely use a regular belt.

templates.name: How many Camera Cubes fit into Travel Backpack?
templates.content: It can accommodate 3 different loadouts: 3 small cubes; 1 medium and 1 small cube; or 1 large cube.

templates.name: I have a (3rd party tripod) which of your plates will work for me?
templates.content: We actually put together a great article about this which you can check out here: https://support.peakdesign.com/hc/en-us/articles/201291333-Using-Peak-Design-Plates-in-3rd-Party-Tripods

templates.name: Will your bags keep my gear safe inside, in case of a drop?
templates.content: Even though our bags are made with compressed foam panels to protect items inside, they're not fully drop proof and proper care should still be taken to keep items inside safe.

templates.name: Do you offer delivery? / I heard about Cornershop, can you tell me more about it?
templates.content: We can indeed now deliver to your house from our Flagship Store in around 90 minutes if you're in the SF area! Prices are the same as what you'd see at the store, though please bear in mind that some store promotions may not apply. Also, Cornershop adds a 10% charge for its services that you will see as "service fee" at checkout. You can download the app here: https://web.cornershopapp.com/

templates.name: What is the weight difference between the carbon travel tripod and the aluminum travel tripod?
templates.content: The aluminum alloy weighs to be about 3.44 pounds/1.56kg and carbon fiber weighs about 2.81 pounds/1.29 kg.

templates.name: Warranty Policy
templates.content: It's our mission to make the best things. Not good, not great, but literally the best products in their respective categories. It's also our mission to not create any unnecessary waste which is why our products come with a no-hassle, no-rhetoric lifetime guarantee. When you spend your hard-earned money on our gear, you can do so knowing it will remain fully-functional and defect-free. You can find more detailed information here: https://www.peakdesign.com/pages/warranty

templates.name: I heard that you have bundle deals. What are the mechanics?
templates.content: Our products exist in an ecosystem and when used together, you can unlock new functionality and benefits! We put together a great article with details on the mechanics of our Bundle Discount here: https://support.peakdesign.com/hc/en-us/articles/360024636751-Bundle-Discount-Rules

templates.name: What is the extra set of hex drive long bolt screws that came with my Capture for?
templates.content: The longer pair of screws are to use if you have a thicker bag strap! One pair of thumb-drive bolts which clamp to any strap up to 1.5 cm thick and one pair of hex-drive bolts which clamp to any strap up to 1.6 cm thick.

templates.name: Does the Everyday Case have a loop?
templates.content: It does! It offers a built-in loop for gripping and it's also worth noting that when not in use, the loop magnetically closes flush with the case, unlike other pocket-snagging grip accessories.

templates.name: I saw a review about how the rubber of the Slide and Slide Lite melts onto clothes while outside in the heat! Has this been taken care of?
templates.content: We were informed of cases like this and quickly released the newly upgraded Slide/Slide Lite. It includes a new silicone grip to address the previous issues and we've reached a point where all inventory we're currently selling have the updated strap with silicon grips.

templates.name: I want to return a gift I got! If I initiate an exchange using your returns center, will it notify the person who ordered the bag?
templates.content: You have the ability to return a gift using our returns center without notifying the person who gave you the present â€” but you have to actually go through the GIFT RETURN process, not fill out the â€œregular returnâ€ info as a customer would when returning. You'll see it below the red "Start Your Return" button and should appear as "Receive a gift? Start Here." For gift returns though, you must know the order # and the ZIP code on packing slip (if it was shipped to you directly as a gift, you should have this).

templates.name: At what speed does the Wireless Charging Stand charge?
templates.content: This actually depends on both the phone as well as the charger used, but generally phone manufacturers advertise their max charging power listed - Apple: 7.5 W (Requires charger that supports apple 7.5W fast charge) - Google: 11 W (Pixel 4 fast charge with any EPP charger, Pixel 3 fast charge with only Pixel stand) - Samsung: 9 W (Fast charge requires the a charger that conforms to Samsung's power negotiation standard).

templates.name: Can the 35L Travel Duffel be folded to fit into a suitcase?
templates.content: The Travel Duffel can indeed be folded and should be able to fit inside a suitcase.

templates.name: Is in-store pick-up available?
templates.content: Definitely if you're in the Bay Area! You can buy it online and pick it up in-store during normal business hours. Just select "pick up" at checkout. Here's the store info: https://www.peakdesign.com/pages/flagship

templates.name: Laptop carry dimensions of the 20L and 30L Everyday Backpack
templates.content: The laptop carry dimensions of the 20L backpack are 38.1cm x 25.4cm x 2.5cm (15"x10"x1"), while the 30L backpack's are 40.6cm x 27.4cm x 3.8cm (16" x 10.8" x 1.5").

templates.name: Does the Field Pouch V2 have straps included?
templates.content: Yes, the Field Pouch v2 includes an external carry strap.

templates.name: How long is the charging cable for the PD charging stand?
templates.content: The charging cable is 2m or 6 feet.

templates.name: What is the diameter of the screw used on the standard plate for the travel tripod?
templates.content: The standard plate screw is 1/4-20.

templates.name: Does your lifetime warranty still apply to products that have already been replaced with a warranty claim?
templates.content: I'm afraid a bag that has been â€œwarrantied outâ€ is no longer eligible for future warranty claims, sorry about that!

templates.name: Where is your flagship store?
templates.content: It's located at 529 Hayes St, San Francisco, CA 94102  and you can call the store directly at +1 415-707-4422.

templates.name: What is the length/width of the strap in the Field Pouch V2?
templates.content: The strap's length is 150 cm (59 in), while its width is 1.5 cm.

templates.name: What's the difference between the Everyday line V1 and V2? (Everyday backpack, messenger, sling, tote, zip and totepack)
templates.content: We've made quite a number of improvements and we're happy to share them with you! For a comprehensive view of the line, you can check this out - https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/2986/1172/files/EDLv2-WhatsNew-All.pdf?v=1583965053

templates.name: Is the strap from the Field Pouch V2 compatible for use with the Tech Pouch?
templates.content: Yes, the strap from the Field Pouch V2 works with the Tech Pouch.

templates.name: Do star trackers work with the Travel Tripod?
templates.content: Some models are actually compatible with our tripod! You can either replace the ball head with our Universal Adapter Head, or could screw a plate directly onto that and then attach with the plate to the ball head.

templates.name: Can I machine wash your bags?
templates.content: Please don't machine wash any of our bags, hand washing is the way to go! You can find more detailed info here: https://support.peakdesign.com/hc/en-us/articles/360025917591-How-to-Clean-Your-Peak-Design-Product

templates.name: Do you do embroidery/personalization on any of your items?
templates.content: We currently only do customizations for wholesale company orders.

templates.name: Do you provide lifetime warranty if I purchase through Amazon?
templates.content: Your PD product is guaranteed for life no matter where and when you bought it, as long as it's the genuine article. This includes peakdesign.com, Amazon, one of our retail partners around the globe, or our very own PD Marketplace, where you can buy and sell used PD gear.

templates.name: I returned an item, when will I receive a refund?
templates.content: Your return credit will be initiated as soon as your return is received and verified at our returns processing facility. Please allow 1-2 weeks for this process to complete in full.

templates.name: Mount/Accessory compatibility with MagSafe phones/cases
templates.content: Our soft-locking mounts and accessories (Tripod, Wallet, Charging Stand, Wall Mount, and Car Mounts) will work with MagSafe phones and cases.

templates.name: Does the Travel Tripod come with a case?
templates.content: Yes, it comes with a padded, weatherproof case.

templates.name: Can I sew/embroider patches and personalize your bags?
templates.content: You definitely can though you just need to be careful as we do have a poly coating on the bags that you can't get too hot or will melt, so it would be best to carefully sew on patches. This can also limit the weatherproofness of the bag as it will poke small holes in it.

templates.name: Can I carry the Travel Tripod using your (Peak Design bag)?
templates.content: You can! We actually put together a sweet article with more details which you can check out here: https://support.peakdesign.com/hc/en-us/articles/360033177271-How-to-Carry-the-Travel-Tripod-in-Your-Peak-Design-Bag

templates.name: I noticed some water trapped/building up between the standard plate and my camera!
templates.content: This is actually due to the plasticizer in the PVC used in the plate pad and is inherent in this material due to the compression force on the plastic pad when attached to the camera. This should not affect the strength or the "anti-twist" nature of the pad and you should be able to easily wipe off with a cloth and/or a mild cleaner.

templates.name: Will the Everyday Case work with 3rd party chargers? / Does the Everyday Case work with Qi wireless charging?
templates.content: The best answer we can give right now is most likely and that it is our intent. It is nearly impossible to answer this question with certainty because there are many many models of wireless chargers on the market with a wide range of different architectures not to mention that we are currently undergoing a redesign of our magnetic array. Our current case design has shown to be functional with most 3rd party chargers and we expect this compatibility to increase with our redesign effort.

templates.name: I'm hearing squeaking in my (product), what do I do?
templates.content: You can actually try using WD40 to lubricate and address the squeaking, or try using a small amount of unused cooking oil or olive oil and apply it to the affected area.

templates.name: Does the motorcycle stem mount work as a normal bicycle stem mount, too?
templates.content: The motorcycle stem mount can't be used on bicycles stems, though this is something we'll definitely consider in the future.

templates.name: How strong is the car mount/chargers magnet?
templates.content: Our Car Mount has built-in magnetic attachment technology (called SlimLinkâ„¢) is ultra secure. It holds your phone during even the bumpiest of rides.

templates.name: Will the magnets in your Mobile line mess with my phone?
templates.content: In short, no. Your phone, and the stuff in it, will be fine and work fine. The longer answer is that we are designing our system such that the magnets will have no adverse impact on your phone's GPS/navigation, accelerometer, near-field communication (NFC), Bluetooth, wifi, internal compass, or any other technical doodad inside of it. This is our intended result, and we are carefully dialing in magnet spacing, strength, and shielding to make this happen. We haven't completed testing on it though, so we can't promise this across every phone or use case.

templates.name: Will the magnets in your wallet mess with credit cards and things in my wallet?
templates.content: In short, no, it shouldn't. We're in the midst of extensive testing to ensure your cards will be fine. We may not be able to prevent de-magnetization of older or lower-strength hotel key cards. So you'll just have to stay at nicer hotels from now on.

templates.name: Customer using phone that's not compatible with Everyday Case
templates.content: It's something we're definitely considering, though we don't have anything concrete in the works at this time. I'll be sure to share your suggestion with the design team as we make future updates to our product line and definitely appreciate the feedback!

templates.name: Can you dismount the Bike Mount using one hand?
templates.content: You can! It features a no-look, 1-handed phone attachment and removal design!

templates.name: I purchase online, can I return my order in-store?
templates.content: Absolutely! You can return the item(s) via our Flagship SF store free of charge without submitting the return online.

templates.name: Is the Car Mount's ballhead removable?
templates.content: The Car Mount's ballhead isn't removable.

templates.name: Can you clean the Everyday Case with antibacterial/bleach wipes?
templates.content: The case is made of a weatherproof nylon canvas fabric which is safe to clean with antibacterial wipes.

templates.name: What's the difference between the Stand Wallet and Slim Wallet?
templates.content: The difference is that the Stand Wallet has a precision-tuned, on-demand, fully-adjustable kickstand that holds your phone at any angle for optimal viewing, while Slim Wallet doesn't have it.

templates.name: Is the Everyday Case compatible with Moment?
templates.content: Our cases aren't Moment-compatible, though this is definitely being considered by our design team! No plans to make compatibility a priority right now, but that could change depending on Kickstarter feedback.

templates.name: Does the Everyday Case work with the Apple Wallet? The alignment magnet is where the loop is and I'm concerned.
templates.content: Apple Wallet should work with the case, but it would indeed block the loop function. You can just remove the wallet to use and enjoy the loop functionality as needed though!

templates.name: When the version of the Everyday Case for a customer's phone does not offer the Loop variant and they want recommendations.
templates.content: Since the version of the Everyday Case for your phone won't be offered with Loop, you can use any third-party PopSocket, loop, or ring.

templates.name: Does the Everyday Case work with MagSafe?
templates.content: The Everyday Case brilliantly connects with MagSafe, it's totally fast and secure! Here's a great video to properly explain this - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NYqcIdpXaSE&t=2s

templates.name: Can the Everyday Sling be worn like a fanny pack?
templates.content: It's possible, but only with the 3L and 6L Slings. You can check out this video where there's a section on Waist Carry at the 9:18 mark: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tm7pufxVdGQ&t=558s

templates.name: Do you have plans to make a Dual Strap?
templates.content: Creating a Dual Strap is something we're considering, but nothing concrete is in the works as of yet. I'll be sure to share your suggestion with the design team though as we make future updates to our product line! Currently, here's what we can recommend when Carrying 2 Cameras: https://support.peakdesign.com/hc/en-us/articles/204949925-Carrying-2-Cameras?source=search&auth_token=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJhY2NvdW50X2lkIjozNjc3OTIsInVzZXJfaWQiOjM4MjA1ODE4NjA1MSwidGlja2V0X2lkIjo0MjUyOTgsImNoYW5uZWxfaWQiOjYzLCJ0eXBlIjoiU0VBUkNIIiwiZXhwIjoxNjM2NTA0MzE1fQ.hsTW5j1C8ZpFfU6NX3gX6Uue2eaLKaNkGAsxCiNHFZA

templates.name: Can you use the Car Mount with the Slim Wallet attached?
templates.content: It isn't something we recommend since the magnetic attraction won't be as strong due to the thickness between the 2 surfaces (phone and mount) if the wallet is in between them.

templates.name: I don't have a printer at home! Can you mail me a return label?
templates.content: We don't have a way to physically mail a return label, though we suggest having it printed at your local Post Office which should provide this service.

templates.name: Is it possible to use the Mobile Tripod without the case?
templates.content: You can, but only if you have a MagSafe-equipped iPhone which allows the Mobile Tripod to be used without the Everyday Case. Here's a video you can check out for reference: https://www.youtube.com/watch?

templates.name: Is the 65L Travel Dufflepack small enough for a typical airline carry-on?
templates.content: The 45L Travel Backpack (which we definitely recommend!) maxes out the carry-on dimensions of most airlines, however, the 65L is able to be rolled and compressed to 35-45L using the external carry straps, and as long as you utilize the roll up feature to make it close to the carry-on dimensions, it should actually be ok.

templates.name: How thick is the rear wall of the Mobile Everyday Case?
templates.content: The rear wall of our Mobile Everyday Case is 2.4mm thick.

templates.name: What's the maximum space the Travel Tripod can be deployed?
templates.content: The Travel Tripod can be deployed at a max of 51.6''as noted on this link - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xV9Pcw0a0Jo&t=1679s It's at the 01:30 mark. And to arrive at your desired length under this, you just have to adjust it to your preference.

templates.name: Will your Rain Fly work for the 20L Everyday Backpack?
templates.content: Our Rain Fly is actually designed for the 45L Travel Backpack and we don't recommend using it for the smaller Everyday Bags, however, we recommend something like this which should work with your 20L Backpack: https://www.rei.com/product/118866/rei-co-op-ducks-back-rain-cover-20-liters

templates.name: Are your bags waxed? / Do you make your own wax canvas for your bags?
templates.content: Our bags actually aren't waxed, the fabric is dipped in PU coating before they're made.

templates.name: How many packing cubes can the 35L Travel Duffel fit? It says 3 in the product page, but it isn't clear which ones!
templates.content: It can actually fit 3 small packing cubes, you can check out this video for more details:  https://youtu.be/rAhFQf9xyFA?t=354

templates.name: Does the medium packaging cube fit inside the everyday bags?
templates.content: Our Medium Packing Cubes are made specifically for our Travel Line. If you are to use it with most of the EDB bags, it will be quite a snug fit.

templates.name: Are your products 100% lead-free?
templates.content: No lead is used across our entire collection as it's actually on the banned substance list we subscribe to.

templates.name: Are you taking used bag donations to help with the situation in Ukraine?
templates.content: We currently aren't collecting bags from US customers, though we're collecting all of our EU returned bags and getting them to refugees who are arriving in Poland. Any photojournalist/journalist on the ground will have full access, for free, to any of our gear that can be useful in sharing critical information about this war  If you know anyone working in Ukraine, please email ukrainesupport@peakdesign.com

templates.name: Travel Backpack 30L Dimensions
templates.content: Our Travel Backpack 30L is 53cm x 33cm x 18cm (20.9" x 13" x 7") and its laptop carry dimensions are 40cm x 29.5cm x 4cm (15.75" x 11.6" x 1.6").

templates.name: Does the Mobile Wallet work with NFC?
templates.content: The Mobile Wallet won't interfere with the apple pay or NFC payment that you might have set up in your phone, but having multiple NFC cards in your wallet can cause them to interfere with each other so you'd need to remove the card in order to use them as NFC.

templates.name: Can I use the External Carry Straps on the Tote Pack?
templates.content: You can! Our Tote Pack utilizes our cord hook system which can be found all over our Everyday Line and Travel Line. Throughout the bag you'll find several attachment points along the bottom and the top, and can easily hook the External Carry Straps into the provided loops. You can use them in different ways including criss-cross at the back, which you can use as a pass through and secure over your suitcase handle.

templates.name: Which bags are compatible with the Everyday Hip Belt?
templates.content: The Hip Belt is designed and measured to fit the 20/30L Everyday Backpack V2, and 20L Everyday Backpack Zip.

templates.name: Customer requests to use specific courier/company to ship out order
templates.content: I'm afraid we don't have control over which courier or shipping partner will end up handling the delivery of your order. Our system automatically assigns it based on contract, area covered, accessibility, and load among other factors. If it's more convenient instead, you can visit one of our local retailers which you can check out here: https://www.peakdesign.com/pages/storelocator

templates.name: The item I listed in PD Marketplace still isn't listed!
templates.content: Just to be sure, when did you list your item in Marketplace? I ask because it actually takes 1 business day to be approved.

templates.name: Are your Mobile products also backed by the no-hassle, no-rhetoric lifetime guarantee?
templates.content: Our Mobile products also have the lifetime warranty.

templates.name: Is there a way to tighten the ball joint in the Mobile Tripod?
templates.content: There's actually a magnetically embedded tool included for adjusting ballhead tension.

templates.name: How are the magnets arranged on the Everyday Case?
templates.content: Here's a pic that illustrates where the magnets are on the case: https://prnt.sc/26jabzu

templates.name: What's the difference between the V1 and V2 dividers?
templates.content: Our newer V2 dividers are softer, have a different fabric, color, and design, but other than that, they're basically the same (even in terms of functionality)!

templates.name: What is the purpose of the three screws on the Universal Head Adaptor?
templates.content: These are actually stabilizing screws to firmly fix a 3rd party head! These help to stabilize the head and prevent it from unscrewing using friction between the screws and the underside of your head. For more details, you can check out this article: https://support.peakdesign.com/hc/en-us/articles/360033194692-How-to-Install-the-Universal-Head-Adaptor-for-the-Travel-Tripod-In-Order-to-Accommodate-Pano-Heads-Video-Heads-and-Other-3rd-Party-Tripod-Heads

templates.name: Why was my order cancelled? / Fraud flag
templates.content: It's likely that the order was rejected by our automated risk management software. We use advanced screening software to detect orders that are fraudulent or have a high chargeback risk. The software analyzes a wide range of info pertaining to your order and if the conditions under which the order is placed are considered high risk it will be rejected. Also, orders that are placed using proxy server or VPN have a high risk for rejection as well. As the system is completely automated and we're currently unable to override, you could try using a different form of payment, different contact and/or shipping information. We also recommend trying to place your order at our Amazon Store here: https://www.amazon.com/peakdesign or at a retailer near you: https://www.peakdesign.com/pages/storelocator

templates.name: Can you use the Slide/Leash and Clutch at the same time?
templates.content: You can! We actually put together a sweet article about this which you can check out here: https://support.peakdesign.com/hc/en-us/articles/201458105-Can-I-use-Slide-or-Leash-and-Clutch-together-

templates.name: Do you have anchor mounts with longer loops?
templates.content: We don't offer longer anchors at the moment, though if you wish to double-up 2 anchors, that's fine as long as it won t cause any damage to any of your gear.

templates.name: How much does the case that comes with the Travel Tripod weigh?
templates.content: The Travel Tripod is protective soft case weighs 84 g (3 oz).

templates.name: Does the Mobile Wallet have RFID blocking?
templates.content: The wallet is not RFID blocking as we deemed working with NFC as a more important functionality.

templates.name: Do you do exchanges?
templates.content: We currently don't offer a direct exchange program. What we offer is our 30-day return policy for items purchased directly from our site. If the item you are looking to exchange was purchased from our site and falls within our 30-day window, then you'll just need to return that for a refund or store credit and then place a new order for the correct item. Start that process here: https://www.peakdesign.com/a/returns

templates.name: Does the 35L Travel Duffel have a dedicated luggage pass through?
templates.content: There's no dedicated luggage pass through on the 35L Duffel, but you can definitely use the hand straps for this function. Check out this video: https://youtu.be/rAhFQf9xyFA?t=2

templates.name: Can I add a gift note?
templates.content: We are currently unable to add gift notes to orders, though it's a feature we hope to have down the line.

templates.name: Will a screen protector work with the Everyday Case?
templates.content: We actually posted a great article that goes into detail about this which you can check out here: https://support.peakdesign.com/hc/en-us/articles/4410677768212-Using-the-Everyday-Case-with-a-Screen-Protector

templates.name: Will the new 14 MacBook Pro fit in the 10L Sling? (the smaller versions are not designed to accommodate a laptop)
templates.content: We have not had a chance to test a 14 MacBook Pro to fit in the 10L Sling. My hunch is if it fits, it will be tight so we don't suggest it. Now, if you really want to test it out, you can go for it and in the event it doesn't work, you can return it for a full refund or store credit.

templates.name: Can I use the Travel Tripod Bag/Pouch with the Spike Feet Set connected/installed?
templates.content: The spiked feet should actually be removed for the Travel Tripod to fit inside its case.

templates.name: Can I exchange/return my kickstarter order?
templates.content: While all of our products are guaranteed for life, we don't offer refunds, returns, or exchanges on Kickstarter items. You can read more about it here: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/peak-design/mobile-by-peak-design-phone-cases-mounts-chargers-magsafe/faqs

templates.name: Does the Everyday Case support CarPlay when it is connected to your Car Mount?
templates.content: You still need to plug in your phone to the USB cord and connect it to your car to be able to use CarPlay, it doesn't work wirelessly or through Bluetooth at this time.

templates.name: How long does the Tripod Cleaning Service normally take?
templates.content: The Tripod Cleaning Service can take up to 2 weeks.

templates.name: My product does not have a serial number and I can t register it for the lifetime warranty!
templates.content: You can try putting N/A on the serial number field in the registration form and this will not void or impact your lifetime warranty. Let me know how it goes!

templates.name: I am on your Marketplace. Do you ship items ordered from there internationally?
templates.content: The PD Marketplace is currently available in the US only, though this is something we hope to expand to other regions in the future, so be on the lookout! I suggest signing up for our newsletter at the bottom of our homepage to ensure you stay up to date on the latest news.

templates.name: What is the wattage of the Car Mount?
templates.content: It actually depends on the phone model! It will charge at a minimum of 5W for all Qi compatible phones, 7.5W with iPhones, and higher power levels depending on the Android phone used.

templates.name: How much do your Camera Cubes weigh?
templates.content: The Small Camera Cube with no dividers is 230g (8.1 oz) and with dividers it is 350g (12.3 oz). The Medium Camera Cube with no dividers is 390g (13.8 oz) and with dividers it is 730g (25.8 oz). The Large Camera Cube with no dividers is 560g (19.8 oz), and with dividers it is 1000g (34 oz).

templates.name: Is the Travel Tripod a good choice with Spotting Scopes? (PART 3/3)
templates.content: For now, we have an add-on adapter: https://www.peakdesign.com/collections/tripods/products/universal-head-adapter that allows our tripod to be used with any 3rd party ball head using a traditional 3/8Â” screw. If you use panning frequently, this adaptor allows for the integration of that specific functionality. Additionally, we have seen some folks using panning adapters on top of our ball head.

templates.name: Is the Travel Tripod a good choice with Spotting Scopes? (PART 2/3)
templates.content: We're aware that the Compact Ball Head may not be ideal for the video-making community or folks who use panning in their photography. Because of this, we hope to have a pan/tilt video in our future product roadmap or an adapter that would work with this current ball head. Similarly, we're closely following feedback about panning functionality and it may similarly influence our development roadmap.

templates.name: Is the Travel Tripod a good choice with Spotting Scopes? (PART 1/3 OF YOU WILL BE SENDING IF YOU GET THIS SPECIFIC QUESTION)
templates.content: The Compact Ball Head on our tripod doesn't have an independent panning function. For our first foray into ball heads, we prioritized space savings and a streamlined interface based around the most common workflows we saw in R&D and user research. Using our ball head ring creates a unique and delightful workflow that is different than typical ball heads and we encourage you to give it a try without comparing features 1:1 with other heads.

templates.name: Have your Travel Tripods been tested in extremely cold temperatures?
templates.content: Our Travel Tripods have been tested in temperatures of -10C to 70C which they have withstood, but we're in the process of running more tests which we will be sure to publish on our site once we have more conclusive results!

templates.name: Shipping time
templates.content: Handling time is generally 1 business day for all shipments unless the item is on pre-order. US orders typically arrive in 2-7 business days. International orders are shipped from our closest international warehouse and usually arrive in 4-10 business days depending on location.

templates.name: Can I take Kindra supplements if Iâ€™m taking other medications or supplements?
templates.content: Consult your health provider prior to using these products if you are taking medications, whether prescription or over-the-counter, or other supplements. Some dietary supplements have been found to interact with medications.

templates.name: What is recycled/repurposed gold and platinum and how does being recycled impact quality?
templates.content:
As part of our commitment to environmental responsibility, we primarily use repurposed and re-refined precious metals in our fine jewelry. Our precious metals come from numerous sources, including post-consumer materials, such as existing jewelry, industrial-use metals, and electronics components. 
  
Because our repurposed and re-refined silver, gold, and platinum are refined back into their pure elements, they are of the same high quality as newly mined metals, without the level of degradation to our natural resources caused by new mining. You can read more about our repurposed gold, platinum, and silver here: https://www.brilliantearth.com/about/mission/report-2024/sustainability/#repurposed-metals

templates.name: How do I start a return?
templates.content: You can start your return here: https://returns.narvar.com/crateandbarrel/returns?_ga=2.152063801.1807174571.1723800655-1858361862.1723800655

templates.name: Can I use Revaree as a lubricant? Do I wait till it dissolves?
templates.content:
Yes, it's designed to provide both short-term lubrication and help maintain longer-term relief and comfort when used as directed. To ensure that Revaree achieves its full efficacy, I suggest you wait until the insert has fully dissolved before engaging in sexual activity. This time will vary, but typically takes about an hour based on feedback. 

Commit to a regular routine with Revaree to maintain your comfort for the long-haul, and be sure to keep your healthcare provider in the loop as well.

templates.name: Does your jewelry tarnish?
templates.content: The tarnishing of gold filled products will accelerate when coming into contact with water, lotion, perfume, and other chemical products, or if you have high PH in your skin. It is not uncommon for gold filled products to begin fading after six months of being worn often.

templates.name: Return policy
templates.content: You can check out our detailed return policy here: https://help.xmondohair.com/en-US

templates.name: Shipping time
templates.content: Please allow 1 business day for all orders to be processed by our warehouse. Orders ship within 2 business days after being processed. Once shipped, you'll receive tracking information from Landmark Global or DHL and after orders reach Canadian borders, your tracking will update. All orders take 4-14 business days in transit.

templates.name: How do I start a return?
templates.content: You can start your return here: https://workbygravel.happyreturns.com/

templates.name: Are the collar and calf stiff?
templates.content: No, the upper calf and topline areas are made of soft, flexible NEOPRENE and will stretch. With the flexible upper, the pant leg can be worn over or inside the boot. The collar material can be turned down to allow hands-free removal and vent humidity in warmer working conditions.

templates.name: Brand ambassador / sponsorship
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! The best way to discuss this is to email us directly at customerservice@bullionsharks.com. Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Military / First responder / Healthcare / Teacher discount
templates.content: Thank you for your service! We don't have any specific discounts like that, but our deals will always be shared with our SMS subscribers or on our website, so keep an eye out!

templates.name: Store location / retailer
templates.content: Yes we have retail locations located in Southern California, check them out here: https://www.fashionnova.com/pages/locations

templates.name: Is VeeGentle safe during pregnancy / breastfeeding?
templates.content: Yes, VeeGentle is fine to use during pregnancy or breastfeeding.

templates.name: Rewards / referral
templates.content: We have a rewards/referral program where you can earn points to redeem on future purchases. Check it out here: https://pleasershoes.com/pages/rewards

templates.name: Rewards / referral
templates.content: We have a referral program where you can give your friends 20%, and get $20 off your next order. Check it out here - https://www.milly.com/pages/refer-a-friend

templates.name: How do I start a return?
templates.content: You can start your return here: https://www.expertelectrical.co.uk/customer/account/login/ Once logged in, simply select your order from the dropdown menu along with a reason for return. Your return will then get processed quickly and efficiently. Alternatively email us at: info@expertelectrical.co.uk with your order number and reason for return and we'll send you a returns authorisation form.
